converter.title: PX2EM Converter
converter.description: PX2EM is a conversion tool which allows you to calculate the em sizes from pixels. Just add the base font size, and the pixels to convert in the bottom input boxs and you're done!
converter.input.baseFontSize.label: Base font size in px
converter.input.pixelRange.label: List of pixels to convert
converter.input.pixelRange.formatHint: (Support range input and commoa separator, e.g. 12 - 20, 50, 100)
converter.result.title: Result
